title: I'm D3 and my ping went from 32 to 73. I noticed no difference.
body:
I'm pulling out the elo card. If your elo is lower than mine, you can't complain about being around 80 ping.


I'm just happy that after 4 months there's going to be a lot of upset silver/bronze east coast players who have one less thing to blame for them sucking so much.
